readable.title: 2936590102_25036069a6
readable.content: A Greyhound dog is wearing a red jersey with the number one on it and is mid run . A greyhound with a red shirt and blue muzzle on running a race . A large greyhound dog races wearing a red shirt . A white greyhound dog is wearing a red jacket with the number one printed on it . White greyhound racing as dog number 1 .
